welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Towamencin, where small town charm meets big city experiences! Explore our beautiful parks, historic sites, and local cuisine while immersing yourself in the unique culture of our town. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Towamencin!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments at Willow Grove NAS Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
